creationTimeUnix.description: Timestamp of creation of this action in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

lastUpdateTimeUnix.description: Timestamp since epoch of last update made to the action.

@class.description: Type of the Action, defined in the schema.

deleted.description: Indication whether the action is deleted

propertyHistory.description: An array with the history of the action.

creationTimeUnix.description: Timestamp of creation of this action history in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

ActionsListResponse.description: List of actions for specific Thing.

totalResults.description: The total number of actions for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

ErrorResponse.description: An error response given by Weaviate end-points.

GraphQLError.description: Error messages responded only if error exists.

operationName.description: Name of the operation if multiple exist in query.

ipOrigin.description: Origin of the IP using CIDR notation.

isRoot.description: Shows if key is root key

keyExpiresUnix.description: Time as Unix timestamp that the key expires. Set to 0 for never.

Meta.description: Contains meta information of the current Weaviate instance.

MultipleRef.description: Multiple instances of references to other objects.

PatchDocument.description: A JSONPatch document as defined by RFC 6902.

from.description: A string containing a JSON Pointer value.

value.description: The value to be used within the operations.

PeerUpdate.description: A single peer in the network

id.description: The session ID of the peer

uri.description: The location where the peer is exposed to the internet

Schema.description: This is an open object, with OpenAPI Specification 3.0 this will be more detailed. See Weaviate docs for more info. In the future this will become a key/value OR a SingleRef definition

SchemaHistory.description: This is an open object, with OpenAPI Specification 3.0 this will be more detailed. See Weaviate docs for more info. In the future this will become a key/value OR a SingleRef definition

type.description: Type of schema, should be "thing" or "action".

version.description: Version number of the schema in semver format.

class.description: Name of the class as URI relative to the schema URL.

SemanticSchemaKeywords.description: Describes a class or property using multiple weighted other words

@dataType.description: Can be a reference ($cref) to another type when starts with a capital (for example Person) otherwise "string" or "int".

name.description: Name of the property as URI relative to the schema URL.

locationUrl.description: url of location. http://localhost means this database. This option can be used to refer to other databases.

type.description: Type should be Thing, Action or Key

creationTimeUnix.description: Timestamp of creation of this thing in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

lastUpdateTimeUnix.description: Timestamp of the last thing update in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

@class.description: Class of the Thing, defined in the schema.

deleted.description: Indication whether the action is deleted

propertyHistory.description: An array with the history of the things.

creationTimeUnix.description: Timestamp of creation of this thing history in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

totalResults.description: The total number of things for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

VectorBasedQuestion.description: receive question based on array of classes, properties and values.

CommonMaxResultsParameterQuery.description: The maximum number of items to be returned per page. Default value is set in Weaviate config.
CommonMaxResultsParameterQuery.name: maxResults

CommonPageParameterQuery.description: The page number of the items to be returned.
CommonPageParameterQuery.name: page

post.description: Registers a new action. Given meta-data and schema values are validated.

async.description: If `async` is true, return a 202 with the new ID of the Action. You will receive this response before the data is persisted. If `async` is false, you will receive confirmation after the value is persisted. The value of `async` defaults to false.

202.description: Successfully received. No guarantees are made that the Action is persisted.

403.description: The used API-key has insufficient permissions.

422.description: Request body contains well-formed (i.e., syntactically correct), but semantically erroneous. Are you sure the class is defined in the configuration file?
